WorkItem.Description:
Hi All,

I am using Phpexcel to read an excel file and dump into mysql database.
its working great with windows and centos. But facing issue with Solaris 10.
when i click on upload button browser saying that connectio refused ..

problem with this line.
$objPHPExcel = PHPExcel_IOFactory::load($uploadfile);

any idea?
WorkItem.Summary: Connection refused issue in solaris with phpexcel1.7.7
